lines.text: Madam, words fail me. Your culinary talents supersede the most exotic cuisine.
Oh, no, no, no, on the contrary...
He means he'd like some more, Ma.
Good! Good! I like to see a young fella who's a good eater.
I must say, in all my travels, I never tasted anything quite like it.
Aw shucks, it ain't nothing but possum tails, owl gizzards, and grits fried in bear grease. And then that there gravy, that's just goat's milk with vulture eggs and mashed catfish eyes.
The catfish eyes brings out the flavor of the possum tails.
Excuse me. I think I forgot something in my jeep.
Why did he leave in such a hurry? Did something just come up?
Not yet, Mr. Tatum, but I think it might.
How I long for the days when all I had was a war to worry about!
